title: Jim Serafim goes to School

abstract: This Film Australia documentary (part of the 'Our Multicultural Society' series) shows the challenges faced by Jim and his Greek migrant parents on his first day at school.
description: Episode of Series "Our multicultural society". A Greek child's first day at school. Demonstrates the difficulties non-English speaking children and their parents have in their "new" country.
